website_summaries.verdict: A gentle, chemical free beard wash that works up a mighty lather with just a drop. Premium care for sensitive skin.
pros: Handcrafted and formulated with high quality organic ingredients
A mild castile base blended with essential oils cleans and conditions simultaneously
A little goes a long way
Leaves beards feeling soft, clean, and manageable
cons: No pump makes dispensing a hassle

customer_reviews.title: fresh, like a baby bald eagle
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Smells like fresh sawdust, identical to the balm and oil. Unlike the balm and oil though, this product works very well. It lathers extremely well and seems to have the right oils in it to not strip your beard of its moisture. I hop out of the shower smelling like my beard just built a log cabin and drop kicked isis on the face! Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Whitey

customer_reviews.title: Poor design bottle
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product as had great reviews and was cheaper and more then what I used in the past.. But all come back to the cheap design and there bottle.. so clearly this product drys out of the screw cap isn’t put back on which causes it to harden. That being said you leave the cap off the push cover pops off and you pour the whole bottle all over yourself and shower and down your drain.. That being said make a pop top out spout like your Competition and you’d get my business again now that I just wasted you’re product down the drain!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my life. A while ago I started growing out my beard and started noticing red, itchy, flaky, dry skin all around my beard. I was using a beard oil but not a beard wash. I bought Mountaineer Brand beard wash and used it for 3 days in a row, following up with beard oil. The results were unbelievable. No more redness, itchiness, flakiness, or dryness ANYWHERE on my face. I now use the beardwash every other day and this has been sufficient to maintain the results. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using their WV Beard Oil for years now. It's a great product and very affordable, so many beard oils are outrageously priced, but not the Mountaineer Brand ones. So I decided to try the Beard Wash. It gives my beard a nice and clean feeling and smells fantastic. But The inner portion of the cap, that dispenses the liquid came loose. I could still get it out and use it, but it was a pain in the butt and dispensed more than I needed. I reached out to their customer service and they were amazing! They sent me a new bottle of beard wash along with a coupon for their site!
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing beard wash
customer_reviews.text: I really like this beard wash. Very strong pine smell out of the bottle but it tapers off until you can barely smell it once you're out of the shower. I haven't had to use any beard balm/oil since I started using it because I feel like it leaves the perfect amount of sheen and moisture in your beard after you've rinsed and dried. Only thing is I wish that fantastic pine smell would linger a little longer after you've rinsed it out.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great for long beards
customer_reviews.text: After using 4 different beard washes, my fiance was looking for a wash that he could use on his whole face and would help his dry skin under his beard. He said to me yesterday that this is the best beard wash he's ever had! His dry skin is gone, his beard is easier to comb, and the Timber scent smells really nice. His beard is about 5-6 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent and Lather
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beard wash, I use about every other day....I don't know if I would use it everyday, it might dry out my beard some. A little goes a long way, I've got about 4 inches of beard and a couple drops will handle it. It's a nice forest like scent that doesn't linger all day but smells great in the shower...almost like I'm cutting down the family Christmas tree! Product loses one star because the bottle leaks a little. For whatever reason it won't seal tight enough. If you are going to travel or otherwise lay the bottle on it's side, I recommend getting a separate travel bottle of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: cmom

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have limited experience trying different products. This wash lathers REALLY nicely so you can use the smallest amount. I imagine this bottle will last a long time. It definitely cleans the grease, dirt, rust, etc from my beard. I would definitely recommend this product. If softness and conditioning is what you want, I'd imagine there is better, if you have a dirty job like me and need a good daily wash, this is a GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: REALLY great wash for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several beard washes, and the Mountaineer Brand is my favorite. You get SO much for your money, and the quality is top notch. I only wash my beard 2-3 times a week (this is recommended by the majority of the "experts"), and it seems like this wash is going to last me a lifetime. I like the pine tar scent, BUT I can see how it may not be for everyone. Luckily, they make a ton of scents. I will definitely be purchasing more Mountaineer Brand products when I run out of oil/balm, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AdamHD

customer_reviews.title: Great beard wash
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the scent but it's not too strong and fades pretty quick. Can't deny the results though. My beard is softer and more manageable compared to when I was using my normal shampoo on my beard. I honestly don't think it's ever been this soft in the 16 years I've had a beard even with using a balm everyday. My beard is very coarse so I use the shampoo everyday and it seems like this bottle will last me 6+ months. For reference, my beard is currently about 4' long but may grow it back out now since it's just so much more manageable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beard wash along with another to test out the product because I was looking for a change in washes. WOW, i was floored by the size of the product and scent. It's a large amount of wash for a beard wash which I was happy about. My favorite thing about this product is the scent (I believe there are three other scents) it has a citrus and spice scent that almost smells like "redwood". It really does a great job when it comes down to lathering and rinsing. Definitely will be buying more once I run out. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime T.

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent of this on my husband!
customer_reviews.text: originally I'm from west virginia and had heard of this brand when it was first starting up. But I wasn't married then and had no need to buy any products. At my local walmart in Texas I found a bottle of this beard wash only in smaller form and finally bought some to make my husband try out. I love the timber scent! It's amazing and my husband uses it on his beard everytime he showers. The soap is gentle and doesn't dry him out. I ordered his 2nd bottle off of amazon. Will order more products for him once he uses up some of his other current products.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnae

customer_reviews.title: Nice product that works
customer_reviews.text: Love this product that I bought for my boyfriend and so does he. Now that's what I would say patchouli is very pleasant. Left his beard very clean and shiny. Highly recommend this product it's great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cedar Levret

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell If You Like the Woods
customer_reviews.text: Very strong citrusy/woodsy kind of smell. Lathers super well and you only need a small amount to get a relatively large amount of lather. If you follow the directions on the bottle and wash only 1-2 times a week, this bottle will last you a very long time. Overall really solid product if you like that natural forestry kind of smell. If those kinds of products are usually too pungent for you, I would try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think a beard wash could be as important as beard oil/wax. I don't even remember why I bought it. I know my husband really liked it a lot because he kept asking me to find it after we packed up everything and moved. He says it makes his beard softer and keeps it from curling up so tightly. He also enjoys the smell. To me it smells a bit like sawdust but fades really quickly. He easily could have gone a week just using regular shampoo in his beard but he has a strong preference for this product which, to me, earns it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Beard Wash
customer_reviews.text: I will tell you this...a dime sized drop of this is plenty! Lathers really well. Leaves my beard feeling clean and my skin under my beard feeling clean as well. Nice pine tar scent. It’s a little strong out of the bottle but it won’t linger. Most importantly it keeps my beard tame and manageable. Also softens the hair up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great overall body wash and shampoo - Please do not change this formula
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much have been using this product for the past few months not as a beard wash, but rather as shampoo and even body wash whenever I felt like I needed a deep clean. It's been working wonders for my scalp and an itchy region on my chest. I was using another pine wash brand and it seems that over the last year or so, they changed the original formula and now that brand does not work so well. In any case, I am going to stick with this brand and as a plus leaves me with a very earthy scent long after washing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rajan

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best beard wash and oils I’ve ever used. The wash lathers up like crazy. Makes the skin under my beard feel great. I then use their oil and my beard is soft. It looks healthier too. Highly recommend this brand. I love all the scents too. Can’t decide on a favorite. Lean towards Pine Tar, but the citrus and timber are awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Falenski

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who desperately needed 'beard shampoo'. He LOVES this. He said it lathers much better than other washes he has had in the past that felt watered down and oily. He also said it helped with the dry skin he develops under his beard often -especially when it's a tad chilly and dry out. Very happy -and smells delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's really only for two kinds of guys. 1. You really miss your mom slathering your entire body with Vick's Vapor Rub when you were 5 years old with a cold. 2. You would like your beard to feel like it escaped from your face, spent a decade crawling through a desert, and has finally returned home.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Great product butt.....
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this product has been the insert or spout always seems to randomly dislodge from the opening & sticks to the inside of the cap, so when you squeeze the bottle instead of a controlled amount you'll get 3 ounces (over embellished amount for comedic purposes)of product in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Kalamazoo from Lush
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick but this product is not for thick beards. I used it more than 5 times and it still doesn’t clean as it should. It makes my (7”) beard feel like I used a generic shampoo. I feel nothing worth wild from this. Leaves my beard tangled after usage whilst blow drying. It leave my beard dry and doesn’t take excess oil away. My beard became dry and unruly. Go to Lush and buy Kalamazoo. You’re welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend because he was out of the product he had been using and I saw this was a local (West Virginia) company. Being from WV, we wanted to support small business so we decided to order it. He loves it! He has since ordered several more products from this company and not one of them as disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Harley F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A little bit definitely goes a long way. I put a dab the size of a quarter into my palm and rub it into my beard. It creates a great thick lather and my beard smells wonderful and feels clean and soft afterwards. I even use this stuff on my hair. Add a good conditioner and you’ll be good to go on the beard and hair game.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best beard wash
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this beard wash to any guy with even a short beard. I'v bought several different brands, everything from drugstore stuff to high end. I had recently purchased the Zeus brand wash and man, that stuff made my beard hair fee like sandpaper and dry out badly. This hydrates your skin and facial hair immediately upon after the first wash. The smell is great as well. Felt a difference after the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G. Coley

customer_reviews.title: Poor bottle,  arrived opened
customer_reviews.text: Arrived opened and oozing. Box had a small dent in it, also had a wireless router that arrived safely. Not sure why the lid was not on tight for shipment. Guess accidents happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some other beard or face wash products, this one doesn't make my bear frizzy and dry. It makes my beard fill clean and soft without making me itch later. Maybe because it doesn't contain any alcohol, but that's just a guess. It has a very mild scent similar to pine tar, but I don't think the scent hangs around.
customer_reviews.author: william dennis

customer_reviews.title: No Better Choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this wash since they started making it - as my beard has gotten longer my use has increased to nearly daily now. Excellent product that keeps your beard clean and skin healthy! There’s no better beard product maker in the game.
customer_reviews.author: jdtaylor68

customer_reviews.title: Beard flakes with a great scent...!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent howver I had bad beard flakes after using this product twice. Other washes have not given me these results.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleanse, good scent in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: The Citrus & Spice smells wonderful in the bottle but quickly works into a lather that smells a lot like Dr Bronner/Castile soap, which makes sense since a lot of the ingredients are similar. I'm happy with the product though. Put some on a scrub sponge for a little exfoliating action and it helps with my beard dandruff a lot.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Timber scent smells good and isn't overpowering. I've been using it as a daily face and beard wash - and have been pleasantly surprised. It leaves my beard and skin feeling soft and hydrated. I wouldn't say it's "watery" like I have read while researching the product - and a dime sized amount honestly lathers up enough for my entire upper body, face and beard. Between the performance, quality and price, I can't recommend this enough if you're looking for a beard wash and/or a gentle facial soap.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Seamans

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this beard wash. The scent is fantastic, it is mild and doesn't dry out my sensitive skin. I have the big bottle at home and the smaller one in my business travel kit. Definitely will continue to purchase and enjoy a good beard scrub with this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: A2theJackson

customer_reviews.title: A repeat customer, and a loyal one at that!
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted my first 4oz. bottle on Christmas in 2018, and using it once or twice a week lasted me a whole year with my modest beard! Since I'm growing it out longer now, I opted to get the 8oz. bottle! The smell is natural and delightful, and when paired with a sandalwood comb, it imparts a divine aroma! I have never had a beard so soft! Did you know that the hair on your face and the hair on your head are two different types? That's why normal shampoo just never cuts it for my taste!
customer_reviews.author: Chase C.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: The husband loves this stuff. He's been using it faithfully for almost 2 years now! Best beard products on the market! Look into the rest of their line of products you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the woodsy smell. It creates the best beard shampoo lather I’ve ever have. Con was that it was delivered in the dead of winter here in Minnesota and it must have froze because it is cloudy and before you rub it in the shampoo in ur hand doesn’t smell like anything. The smell does get reduced I figure since it doesn’t smell as good as the other bottles I’ve gotten.
customer_reviews.author: TRISHA

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch to your beard
customer_reviews.text: The best beard shampoo I have ever used. Ive used plenty of beard shampoos, some costing twice as much as this and in a smaller bottle. This bottle packs a punch to your beard. Smells great, all you need is a dime size to put in your palm when you are showering to lather and cleanse the beard of the daily grime. No dried out beard after using this shampoo either. Makes the beard easier to groom. Looks like i found my go to beard wash!
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Tried the others, keep returning to the best
customer_reviews.text: Been using bear shampoo a few years now, and have tried dozens of brands. The one I keep coming back to is Mountaineer. It leaves my beard the softest, and easy to comb. It's gentle enough to use every day (I stick with every other), and a little goes a long way, making this one of the most economical on Amazon. There's a few that are cheaper, but they are loaded with chemicals. Mountaineer's line is 100% natural.
customer_reviews.author: Cannavangelist

customer_reviews.title: Kind of oily for me
customer_reviews.text: The wash is really strange for me and I want to love it. The scent is great and it suds up nicely. Unfortunately, the amount of oil in if makes me feel unclean after washing my beard. It almost seems like I’m washing with sudsy beard oil. Overall, I have no complaints about the products performance and living up to its claims. It’s just not the right wash for me as I don't care for the residual oil feel. As a note my beard is 6” in length. This may be better for shorter beards... I can not vouch for that.
customer_reviews.author: K. Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He doesn't like anything heavily scented, and he was really impressed with the smell. It's not too strong to be under his nose all day, and it's a nice scent. This is his go to product for managing his beard. His beard gets extremely thick and wavy. Using the wash, balm, and oil kit his beard is now straight and tamed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and this bottle will last forever
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to say besides it's an amazing shampoo and a little goes a long way - trust me. I first poured a lot and then when you rub it in your hands you quickly realize that it would be enough to clean your head of hear not just your beard... Just put a dime size (if that) and put some water and rub your hands together. I only do it in the shower so its easy but anything more than that and your bathroom will be covered in suds.
customer_reviews.author: Blake B.

customer_reviews.title: May work for some - but couldn't get past smell
customer_reviews.text: I've only been to WV once so I can't really say what WV timber smells like, but having grown up in Oregon I would compare this more to the pungent smell of a pulp mill and not fresh cut trees and sawdust. For something that is used on my face I couldn't get past the smell enough to really determine if it worked as a wash, I was in too big a hurry to rinse it off. Great price for the amount of wash you get - wish it would have smelled better.
customer_reviews.author: al.outside

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Natural and mild scent
customer_reviews.text: My husband was given these products as a gift and he likes them so much (and I like the smell) that we just ordered them to restock. Really pleased with the natural ingredients and mild scent. As well as the overall look that it creates.
customer_reviews.author: Domestikate

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!! I'm sexy again!!
customer_reviews.text: That's an attention grabber, eh? No, I'm still the same guy I've always been, just feel and smell a lot better. Only thing I would change is the bottle top. It really should be a flip open top. Handles much better with wet hands.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz R

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is one of those guys who won't use anything but a bar of Dial! Well, he was getting real dry skin under his beard, and I bought him this to try........never said much, but I could smell it, and feel his beard.....so silky! Dry skin is gone, and when he said to me the other day, "I'm almost out of that beard stuff, better order some!" I knew we had a WINNER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Darragh

customer_reviews.title: Best beard wash available !
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff ! All natural and the essential oils are so good for you ! Tis the best beard wash on the market ! 2 thumbs up 👍👍 and 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 😁
customer_reviews.author: Liam Harv

customer_reviews.title: Best beard brand!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first beard shampoo I had ever tried, and I love it. I also use the beard oil and beard balm from the same company, but I use those on days where I know I won't be able to shower, and thus be unable to use the shampoo. This product leaves my beard feeling soft to the touch, and the ladies can't keep their hands off of it. I've gone through one bottle of timber-scented shampoo and have just purchased the coal-scented. I am extremely curious as to how the event will fare over the timber one, but I have no doubt it will smell, feel, and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McNatt

customer_reviews.title: Best beard products on the market.
customer_reviews.text: My husband will only use Mountaineer brands for his beard. He has tried other brands but they dry out his skin then his skin flakes and itchs. Since we have found Mountaineer beard wash and oil, over two years ago, there is no other brands to try. His beard is soft with no more drieness, flakyneess or itching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suds Galore
customer_reviews.text: This stuff turned my beard into a full on bubble bath. And due to the timber scent it felt like that bath was in the middle of a pine forest. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer E. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, somewhat lived up to hype
customer_reviews.text: Nice wash, noticed a clean soft feeling right out of the shower. Definitely need some balm or oil afterwards though as my skin felt dry after using.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: SO SO
customer_reviews.text: Not all that great to be honest. Makes my beard feel sticky and greesey and to be honest it does not make it soft at all. Not impressed. Scent is so so. Not the best but could be worse
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Thick Lather
customer_reviews.text: So the beard is getting a bit long, so I thought I would grab a bit of shampoo just for my beard. I put just a dab in my hand and in just a few swipes of the beard I was at a full Santa Claus white bearded lather. It foams up nice and smells great. After the shower my beard feels soft and fresh. It says 1-2 times per week so I won't use it everyday, but I do love the smell and the feel of my beard afterwards. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do you like cedar chips?!
customer_reviews.text: I returned I personally cannot stand the smell of cedar chips. This does not smell like "Timber" (Freshly fell/cut Maple, Oak, Mahogany, Sycamore, And Cherry trees) this smells like someone setting up the bedding of a guinea pig. Will be trying a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: Joel McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Quality Beard Wash
customer_reviews.text: I've used several beard washes and this one is superior to all the rest. Love the smell and the fact that it produces a nice lather. Beard feels great.
customer_reviews.author: 1Bama1

customer_reviews.title: Best wash you’ve never had!
customer_reviews.text: Best beard wash you’ll ever buy. Was a little skeptical of the small portion size bottles but trust me when I say this, a little goes a LONG ways!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very mild scent. Very soft beard. Insert in the top of bottle that controls flow of product isn’t secure, always popping out. But product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Shaman

customer_reviews.title: Best Beard Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have used 5 other shampoos and this, hands down, is my absolute favorite. A little bit goes a long way, it has a great lather, won't dry out your skin, smells good, pairs well with any beard balm, and the bottle isn't so stiff that you can't get the shampoo out (this may seem like a stupid observation but I can assure you it's a real thing with other products). If you're looking for a great beard shampoo then stop. You found it. It's this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good beard shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has great cleaning power and after use it makes combing easier, I also prefer its soapiness, only a small dollop is all that is needed for my 6ish inch beard hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner for tangled beards!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!. I have used serval beard washes over the years but this one seems to be the best. I suppose it cleans the same as others but the conditioning quality is what I was most impressed by. It leaves my beard looking great and tangle free so less brushing a real plus! As far as some people's issue with the lid, the bottle is a common size so another pour lid will fit. I was lucky enough the top from my previous wash fit. Overall great product and will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: eyegithi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order, I ordered a gift set for my husband that included this and many other of their amazing products. My husband uses the wash and absolutely loves it. He purposely asked me to get this brand and scent again. Usually, he doesn't care about his products and just tells me to get whatever is on sale so that says a lot. I appreciate how soft his beard feels with this and their other products (like the oil)!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this new beard wash a few times but can already feel a difference. It lathers you really good. You only need a small amount. I will definitely order this beard wash again. I will also look into your other products.
customer_reviews.author: Code Seven

customer_reviews.title: awesome beard wash ladies and gents
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is awesome! it leaves my beard so soft and smooth! and it smells great! i would recommend it. you literally only need the smallest amount. ive had it for 2 weeks and i use it everyday. its like i havent used any because it is so effective for even the smallest amount.
customer_reviews.author: Gp

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brand
customer_reviews.text: Tried a lot of different brands from honest amish to some other big name brands and this is definitely my favorite beard wash
customer_reviews.author: Hknirk

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this beard soap! I just put a nickel size drop and it lathered up my beard great, the scent is amazing! Will definitely order again and try other scent! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Originally received the smaller bottle size when ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Originally received the smaller bottle size when I bought the complete kit. Enjoyed it so much that I bought the big 8oz bottle when I ran out. The West Virginia Timber scent puts a smile on my face and like that it prevents me from breaking out underneath my ginger beard.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo for Beards.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo smells great. I use it in tandem with Mountaineer Brand Beard Oil. My grandson runs his fingers through and says soft beard!
customer_reviews.author: ibm360

customer_reviews.title: My Wife loves da scent and how soft it leaves my beard after I shower
customer_reviews.text: Very foamy all u need is a pea size amount. The scent is great and it leaves ur beard feeling soft. I use it at least every other day. This is my 3rd time buyn this product and will definitely continue to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a good price. Not much needed to get a good lather
customer_reviews.text: Used the product this morning after receiving it yesterday. Works very well in terms of cleaning my beard without drying it out. I only needed a small pea sized drop to lather up my entire beard and face. I’m not crazy about the pine tar scent. It is a bit medicine-like but it faded by the time I got out of the shower. This is my first mountaineer brand purchase and probably won’t be my last due to the great price point and high quality of the products.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for beard care
customer_reviews.text: I only take time to write reviews when products deserve it and this one certainly fits that category. I discovered Mountaineer Brand several months ago and started with the WV Timber scent. This time, I tried the WV Coal scent and I love it! The scent is light with mint overtones and is certainly not overbearing like other brands. I use it daily and a little bit goes a long way. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Bowers

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my beard and hair soft and healthy looking. I have added length since I stared using this 3 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Ohrberg

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! A little goes a long way. Great lather. Good Smell, Rinses out well, Leaves facial hair soft and conditioned. Got first bottle for Christmas last year, and decided to stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this shampoo/beard wash a couple of times, however, it seems to leave my beard feeling softer.
customer_reviews.author: WackyErnie

customer_reviews.title: Fairly long lasting; great value.
customer_reviews.text: If you use the product 1 or 2 times a week like the bottle suggests, this bottle will last quite a while as even with a fairly full beard, one small dollop is enough to cover it. I'm not too crazy about the timber scent, so I'll try another next time; and there will be a next time.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Clean WVA
customer_reviews.text: really like this stuff smell not over powering little goes long way lathers great rinses clean gets my vote.
customer_reviews.author: J.W

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I used to wash my beard with the same shampoo as my head and decided to try this product out just to see if it was all hype or if it was worth the extra step. I must say after the first bottle I noticed my beard was healthier, looked nicer, grew thicker and was softer. I am now a loyal customer and will continue my business because this product delivers and the results speak for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: kevin puinti

customer_reviews.title: Solid Beard Wash
customer_reviews.text: The scent here is basically pine - follow the instructions and shake each time and you won't get the chemical smell others discuss. I haven't noticed any magic transformation of my beard but this feels like it's cleaning and had a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: James Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Best beard wash I have tried. Used it before and chose different ones after because the place I used to get of from stop carrying it. But so glad I found it on amazon. Softens beard. Stops the itch. All you have to do is use a dab. And it’s plenty. Others you had to use such a bigger quantity to get coverage. Hands down the best!
customer_reviews.author: John W Kennett

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Beard wash!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stuff for years and it really is great beard wash. The smell is amazing and clean. Once the virus mess is over I plan on restocking for bread growth again.
customer_reviews.author: Shake N Bake

customer_reviews.title: Smells great - needs updated cap.
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily and it doesn't dry my beard out. Smells good - personal preference but I like that rosemary, piney, outdoors smell. I appreciate the natural ingredients (no sulfates). Minor annoyance: Its a screw cap, which doesn't make any sense for this type of application. A treatment pump or even press top disc lid would be better.
customer_reviews.author: A&M

customer_reviews.title: Try it and help us with your opinion
customer_reviews.text: Good and makes the skin clean and comfortable, but it does not give the beard the required smoothness .
customer_reviews.author: Tamim Abbass

customer_reviews.title: Great product! And easy solution to cap problem
customer_reviews.text: This wash is the best I've used; I've tried several all natural versions and the old spice , this is the only one that doesn't itch and makes my beard so soft! A lot of comments about the cap here , just wanted to share a solution ... this bottle cap fits perfect as a pump replacement! Empty Lotion Bottles 8 Oz....
customer_reviews.author: David Beede

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. Leaves my beard a little dry, but when complemented by beard oil from the same company, it results in a nice texture and manageability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow !!! All got to say really.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've ever washed my face & enjoy it so much at the same time well this beard wash is THAT good trust me it feels excellent on the face really smooth smells incredible to there's absolutely no downside it's worth every single penny EXCELLENT PRODUCT ! WILL BUY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Dark J Enforcer

customer_reviews.title: Great beard wash
customer_reviews.text: Like the natural ingredients and oils. Leaves my beard softer. I like the Citrus and spice scent. It's subtle to me and not overpowering. Great customer service. Somehow Amazon had the outer wrapper mislabeled with one scent but the bottle was another. Mountaineer made it right, straight away.
customer_reviews.author: KGreen

customer_reviews.title: Soft. Luscious locks
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this for awhile now. After receiving it as a gift. I get many compliments on my beard. Even after cutting down trees for firewood
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kasmar

customer_reviews.title: ... many beard shampoos and this one is definitely the best (in my humble opinion) It smell great
customer_reviews.text: Let me first tell you I've tried many beard shampoos and this one is definitely the best (in my humble opinion) It smells great, I love that it lathers up really well , we have hard water in our town and it's hard to get a good lather but not with this stuff. Left my beard feeling silky smooth and that's a good thing (especially for your wife or girlfriend). What I like most is after with just one use it healed my dry skin and itchy beard. No more beard dandruff. Give it a try, its good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Great smell. Makes beard so soft. Only need a tiny amount and it lathers up real nice
customer_reviews.author: JLWHARFRAT

customer_reviews.title: Very harsh and drying
customer_reviews.text: I have slightly dry skin and this is VERY harsh and drying for me. Sad because I love the scent so much. I definitely feel like it's stripping oil. I feel absolutely parched when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My beard is 6 inches at its longest point and it lathered in nicely smells great better then others I've used. Gets it nice and soft but keeps it firm. Once I put oils in and wax in it stays nice all day and even into the next.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Trucker approved.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great at controlling beard-ruff and softening hair as well as the skin underneath. For the price I really see no equal. I will say that after my bottle of pine tar runs out I’ll be switching to timber though. I’ve used pine tar soap for years,and this beard wash is a bit heavy on the tar and light on the pine for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Beard Wash
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite beard wash on the market. I love the smell and the blends of natural ingredients. Leaves the skin under my beard and mustache clean and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: We've bought t his before and will continue to do so. It works on the beard!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Hilty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Screw cap is an awkward choice for dispensing, should be like a shampoo push to open cap. The product itself is amazing. Smells great and really does fill in the beard! Helps give color too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Murray

customer_reviews.title: But it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It has a good, lasting scent, that isn’t overpowering. It does a good job cleaning both the skin underneath the beard and the beard itself, while also conditioning. Worth the price for a great product made in the U. S. of A. Definitely my favorite beard care company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm rating 5 stars because it's a great product, but I will add one small nitpicky ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating 5 stars because it's a great product, but I will add one small nitpicky complaint I have. The clear plastic bit that goes inside that regulates how much you can squeeze out likes to come out inside the cap when I unscrew it. It always goes back in when I tighten the cap back down and it snaps into place again, but it does get a bit annoying at times. As I said, other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: James Witham

customer_reviews.title: Great beard products.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it makes my beard feel after using the shampoo. The citrus scent was ok but some may love it. The coal scent is my favorite and my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Beard Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great aroma, great lather, clean beard. The shampoo has a restrictor top to help control the amount used. I used about a dime size amount for lather. This shampoo rinsed clean without issue.
customer_reviews.author: John Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Follicly-challenged need not apply
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting something dangerous and this fit the bill. So I dusted off the old good card and bought a bottle. I applied some the first day and just recently regained my memory. This was 3 days ago. I woke up wearing a bear skin and had several women cheering me on as I made bacon for all three meals that day. This is some powerful stuff guys, you've been warned
customer_reviews.author: Andy Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: The only beard shampoo you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak anymore highly of this product. I've been using it for YEARS and it's the only beard shampoo that does the job right. I've tried other store bought ones and their garbage. The timber shampoo and oil go great together and this is the only beard shampoo I'll ever get again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this stuff. It gets super foamy and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly sholley

customer_reviews.title: Good product sub par packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This beard wash is really good. It lathers up well, cleans well and has a great scent. My reason for deducting a star is the piece of plastic inside the top of the bottle came out with the lid on the first opening. I managed to pry it loose and insert it back in the bottle but it came out again. Unfortunately this allows ALOT more product out of the bottle than I need...even when being careful. I'll order another bottle when this one is finished but if that bottle is faulty as well then I'm done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Beard Wash by Mountaineer Brand (8oz) | WV Coal Scent (Peppermint & Patchouli) | Premium 100% Natural Beard Shampoo
feature_bullets: HYDRATE AND CLEANSE your beard with all-natural mild Castile-based shampoo and Essential Oils

STOP STRIPPING YOUR BEARD OF ITS NATURAL OILS -- Regular shampoo strips your beard of the oils Mother Nature provides naturally. When you do that, your beard gets confused and either dries out or works overtime to produce extra oil to compensate. Either way, it's a mess!

NOT ALL BEARD WASH IS THE SAME -- Some contain harmful chemicals that will break the already fragile hair on your beard. Treat your beard with care and it will strengthen and become less brittle over time.
FRIZZ AND FLAKES ARE A THING OF THE PAST when you use the right beard wash. A mild wash with essential oils once or twice a week is all you need.
CLEAN, SOFT, MANAGEABLE, SHINY AND TANGLE FREE STRAIGHT FROM THE SHOWER
